notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: ME: data collection and analysis, manuscript writing and review. FM: data analysis, results discussion, manuscript review. AD-J: data analysis, results discussion, manuscript review. MP: database work-up and data collection. CO: results discussion, manuscript review. CM: results discussion, manuscript review. PR: study design, data analysis, manuscript writing and review. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
